bwwExcerpt: If Jenna Fischer wanted to shed the good-girl image she acquired during nine seasons on NBC's The Office, a Neil LaBute play is a pretty great way. Steph - her hot-tempered, foul-mouthed, physically and abusive character in the oddly captivating Reasons to Be Happy - is worlds away from reserved receptionist Pam Halpert. If, however, Fischer wanted a dynamic, meaty role for her professional stage debut, she's about five years and one play too late...Happy stands on its own, of course; so if you
